headline: BMO Raises GE Vernova (GEV) PT, Keeps Outperform Rating
summary: GE Vernova (NYSE:GEV) is one of the 13 Best Large Cap Stocks to Buy Right Now. On July 8, BMO Capital kept an “Outperform” rating on GE Vernova Inc. (NYSE:GEV) while increasing its price target from $522 to $590. The firm’s updated analysis focused on the company’s Gas Power business. BMO Capital analysts highlighted strong, […]
